Label: E-codices project
Images: jpgs at maximum resolution of 5Mb, see http://www.e-codices.unifr.ch/en/info/imaging
Downloads: no direct means of downloading images? 3rd-party download script available from Ryan Baumann, https://gist.github.com/ryanfb/6553866

Label: Gallica
Images: PDF of entire manuscripts created from source images at a minimum of 300 dpi, see http://gallica.bnf.fr/html/und/comment-les-documents-sont-ils-numerises
License: In accordance with French Law n°78-753, public-domain material is freely available with attribution to the original source.  http://gallica.bnf.fr/html/und/conditions-use-gallicas-contents

Label: Metropolitan Museum of Art, Image Resources
License: Non-commercial reuse permitted with attribution, see http://www.metmuseum.org/information/terms-and-conditions

Label: Sächsische Landesbibliothek – Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Dresden (SLUG)
Downloads: pdf of entire MS or of individual pages

Label: Heidelberg, Universitäts-Bibliothek
Images: pdfs at choice of two resolutions
API: RSS feeds for individual sections, e.g., Bibliotheca Palatina http://digi.ub.uni-heidelberg.de/diglit/rss?modus=incl&set=bibliotheca_palatina or manuscripts http://diglit.ub.uni-heidelberg.de/diglit/rss?set=handschriften

Label: Heinrich Heine Universität, Düsseldorf, Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek
Martin-Luther Universität Halle-Wittenberg, Universität- und Landesbibliothek Sachsen-Anhalt
Westfälische Wilhelms-Univertät, Münster, Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek Münster
